mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CMIS_BOARD ORDER BY board_num DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CMIS_BOARD (board_title, board_content, board_writer, board_date, board_img_name, board_hits) VALUES (#{board_title}, #{board_content}, 'ttester', sysdate(), #{board_img_name}, 0)
INSERT INTO CMIS_COMMENT (board_num, comment_content, comment_writer, comment_date) VALUES (#{board_num}, #{comment_content}, 'ttester', sysdate())
mapper.select: SELECT board_num, comment_num, comment_content, comment_writer, date_format(comment_date, '%y-%m-%d %H:%i') comment_date FROM CMIS_COMMENT WHERE board_num = #{board_num} ORDER BY comment_num DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CMIS_COMMENT WHERE board_num = #{board_num} AND comment_num = #{comment_num} AND comment_writer = #{comment_writer}
